short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to simplify Shopify navigation operations and save time!!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify admin panel navigation operations, importing, exporting and duplicating, are daunting repetitive operations, that take so much time. the motivation for this extension is to make these operations easier, straightforward and save Shopify users so much time.
